links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''John Charles Elton Le Mesurier De Somerys Halliley''' ([[5 April|April 5]], [[1912]] - [[15 November|November 15]], [[1983]]) voiced the part of [[Bilbo Baggins]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on [[BBC|BBC 4]]. He also sang a demo version ''[[Bilbo's Last Song]]'', which was first aired in [[1982]] and appeared as an extra on the third volume in the [[2002]] reissue of the series.
